channel.title: Rngeus the goddess (Neutral Killing)
channel.description:
Excuse you I am a goddess-Immune to bleeds poisons and death and night. Immune to occupation and redirection.
Day ability 1-Did you just call me a god-Smite a player-They will die instantly. From their death another person will die at night randomly and can't be prevented.
Night ability 1- Pray to me- Kill a random player at night bypassing everything
Night ability 2- 2 shall die-randomly kill two people bypassing everything's
This is joke no hurt
